mapper.select: update INSBRiskplanrelation set operator = #{operator},modifytime = #{modifytime},noti = #{noti},planname = #{planname},plankey = #{plankey},riskkindid = #{riskkindid},isshow = #{isshow},isselected = #{isselected},selectkey = #{selectkey},isflag = #{isflag} where id = #{id}
select * FROM insbRiskplanrelation GROUP BY plankey
